channel.title: DeathKnightScape 508/525 24 Skills available/KBD/KPQ/4Godbosses/PkingArea
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left][b]DeathKnightScape is a 508 Private server its already released and releasing the new update soon;) This is the current development , i coded this with my brother and comfy [/b][/shadow]
[img]http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/8789/naamloosax.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/608/dragonslayer.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/5821/skillsgr.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/636/skills1t.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img232.imageshack.us/img232/1513/skills2l.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img689.imageshack.us/img689/9876/shopst.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img179.imageshack.us/img179/6571/bossesj.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/4322/deathknightscapejoinus.jpg[/img]
[img]http://img34.imageshack.us/img34/2377/skillcapesp.jpg[/img]
[b]Normal player commands:: [/b] ::edge ::godswords ::vmelee ::vrange ::skillhoods ::skillcapes ::skillcapest ::barrage ::veng ::jad ::map ::bh ::players ::item ::bank ::lunar ::ancient ::modern ::male ::female ::yell ::home ::zammy ::bandos ::sara ::armadyl ::kbd ::kq ::credits ::rules ::empty ::repinfo ::mypks ::myrep ::ags ::sparebook ::vmelee ::vrange ::newitems ::food ::mall ::dharockraid (broken) ::map ::changepass ::fart ::freak ::duelarena (broken) ::bh ::summon ::jail ::shops ::yanille ::ge ::chill ::pool ::cw ::elf ::pro ::varrock ::drags ::time ::monsta ::begin ::players ::rep (broken) ::skull ::joinclan ::modcommands ::resetrep ::comfy
[b]MOD Commands:[/b] ::mute::unmute::hourmute::spam ::teletome::teleto::kick::d::coords
[b]Admin Commands:[/b] ::god::godoff ::staff ::givesummon ::item (spawns items) ::teletome (tele to me username) ::teleto (tele to username) ::kick ::mute ::unmute ::spam (spam selected player ::hourmute ::demote ::bowtome (bow to me) ::makeallwalk ( tells every one to be gay) ::kill (kills selected player) ::exhume (kills selected player) ::object (drops Objects equal to the number) ::maxrep ::multi ::maxie ::resethp ::unlimited (unlimited Special) ::npc ( Spawn NPC ) ::ppnpc ( Morph u into NPC) ::money ::maul ::scare ::crashclient ::banip ::ban ::unban ::givemember
[shadow=red,left]Features: Need money to buy Features 24 Skills Trainable, Teleports To all 24 Skills -------- 100% 24 Normal Skill Capes retrievable at the Master's --------- 100% 24 Skill Capes(T) Retrievable at the second SkillCape ---------- 100% 17 Shops Available Range - Mage - Melee - Skills --------- 100% 1 Big custom Quest (1 small error Will be fixed) --------- 85% (18Steps) Castlewars Fully Working ---------------------------------- 80% (Most of the time it already started) Bountyhunter Working --------------------------------------- 99% Bosses available: kbd / kpq / Jad / ---------------------------- 100% Godwars Dungeon (with NPC) ---------------------------------- 80% (npc don't walk yet there) Moneymaking Features --------------------------------------- 90% (Not all NPC drop's Money yet) Full Wilderniss PvP - Full Pking Area -------------------------- 99% Summoning Monsters and pets ----------------------------- 80% (they don't atk)[/shadow]

item.description:
@naomigirl wrote:

[shadow=red,left]DeathKnightScape is a 508 Private server its already released and releasing the new update soon;)
This is the current development , i coded this with my brother and comfy [/shadow]

Normal player commands::
::edge
::godswords
::vmelee
::vrange

Admin Commands:
::god::godoff
::staff
::givesummon
::item (spawns items)
::teletome (tele to me username)
::teleto (tele to username)
::kick
::mute
::unmute
::spam (spam selected player
::hourmute

::bowtome (bow to me)

::exhume (kills selected player)

[shadow=red,left]Features:
Need money to buy Features
24 Skills Trainable, Teleports To all 24 Skills -------- 100%
24 Normal Skill Capes retrievable at the Masterâ€™s --------- 100%
24 Skill Capes(T) Retrievable at the second SkillCape ---------- 100%
17 Shops Available Range - Mage - Melee - Skills --------- 100%
1 Big custom Quest (1 small error Will be fixed) --------- 85% (18Steps)
Castlewars Fully Working ---------------------------------- 80% (Most of the time it already started)
Bountyhunter Working --------------------------------------- 99%
Bosses available: kbd / kpq / Jad / ---------------------------- 100%
Godwars Dungeon (with NPC) ---------------------------------- 80% (npc donâ€™t walk yet there)
Moneymaking Features --------------------------------------- 90% (Not all NPC dropâ€™s Money yet)
Full Wilderniss PvP - Full Pking Area -------------------------- 99%
Summoning Monsters and pets ----------------------------- 80% (they donâ€™t atk)[/shadow]
